content:
# I have successfully gathered more iron ore and inserted it into the furnace for smelting. 
# After smelting, I now have 5 new iron plates in the furnace, which I can retrieve.

# My current inventory is as follows:
- 6 wood
- 5 stone
- 10 iron ore
- 1 iron plate
- 2 iron gear wheels

# I will now extract the 5 iron plates from the furnace to add to my inventory. This will give me a total of 6 iron plates.

# Extracting the iron plates from the furnace:
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace, quantity=5)

# Checking the inventory after extraction
print(f"Inventory after extracting iron plates: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Now that I have 6 iron plates, I can craft more iron gear wheels. 
# I still need to craft 8 more iron gear wheels to reach the total of 10 needed for the assembling machine.

# I will craft as many iron gear wheels as I can with the available iron plates.
while inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 2 and len(inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronGearWheel, [])) < 10:
    craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel)

# Checking inventory after crafting more iron gear wheels
print(f"Inventory after crafting more iron gear wheels: {inspect_inventory()}")
